content:
Hello

How to resize files to upload in zulip?

Thank You
Zulip doesn't give you options to crop a video or re-encode in a lower resolution it to save some space. You need to do that before you upload it.
or are you asking what other software you can use to shrink your video? depends on your platform; Windows, Linux, Mac?
No, what I ask is that Zulip allows me to upload up to 25 MBs, and I want to leave the highest quota.
If you want to share really large files (>25MB), I'd recommend doing that with something like Dropbox and pasting the link into Zulip.

@Tim Abbott
Can I resize upload files limit from 25 to lower? Maybe 10 or something like that?
@Karol K yes. Edit MAX_FILE_UPLOAD_SIZE in /etc/zulip/settings.py.
